name: Asynchronous Demo Plugin
description: A plugin demonstrating asynchronous actions, progress reporting, and cancellation.

actions.name: long_computation
actions.description: Simulates a long computation that reports progress and can be cancelled.

duration_seconds.description: The number of seconds the task should simulate running for.

steps.description: The number of steps to divide the duration into for progress reporting.

returns_schema.description: A message indicating the result of the computation.
